metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8780 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
In Ruby before 2.2.10, 2.3.x before 2.3.7, 2.4.x before 2.4.4, 2.5.x before 2.5.1, and 2.6.0-preview1, the Dir.open, Dir.new, Dir.entries and Dir.empty? methods do not check NULL characters. When using the corresponding method, unintentional directory traversal may be performed.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8780` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libruby2.3 - 2.3.1-2~16.04.9
ruby2.3 - 2.3.1-2~16.04.9
ruby2.3-tcltk - 2.3.1-2~16.04.9
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby2.3 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.3.1-2~16.04.9').
